componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},

Why not take a break from complexity with our portfolio of FLEXcon® PHARMcal® Pharmaceutical Labeling Solutions?

Place your confidence in our industry-compliant solutions with high-performance adhesive systems that offer high shear strength to hold films in place and prevent tunneling due to mismatched tension.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Relax knowing that our Change Management Process ensures consistent material performance.
  • PHARMcal® SUPREME - High-Performance Materials for Vials, Syringes, and Ampules
  • PHARMcal® OTC - Printable Substrates for Over-the-Counter Drug Labeling 
  • PHARMcal® CONCEAL™ - Opaque Materials for Clinical Trials and Over-labeling
  • PHARMcal® CryoFLEX™ - Engineered Materials for Extreme Storage Conditions
  • PHARMcal® TAMPERmark™ - Tamper Evident Materials for Security and Counterfeit Protection
  • PHARMcal® BIOmark – Single-ply or Piggyback Constructions for Asset Tracking of Blood Products

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Simplify and rely on PHARMcal®. Click or reach out to me - whatever is easier for you!

{{{Sender.Signature}}}
